data.actual_result: Moves to Channel was in before and have mic UnMuted
data.expected_result: Should Stay in The channel that you dont have permission and have your mic unmute normally.
data.short_description: Being Moved Into Channel without Permission.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be Moved into a Channel without Permission to join - Mute Your Microphone - Then you should get moved back to Original Channel.
